ref: 599 aráṇi -- , ˚ṇī -- f. ʻ the piece of wood used for kindling fire by attrition ʼ RV., m. ʻ the plant Premna spinosa the wood of which, like that of Ficus religiosa, is so used ʼ lex., ˚ṇikā -- f. lex.
Pa. araṇi -- , ˚ṇī -- f. ʻ wood for kindling by attrition ʼ;
Pk. araṇi -- m. ʻ the tree whose wood is so used ʼ;
Or. araṇi ʻ tinder -- stick, flint for kindling ʼ; arnī f. ʻ the tree whose wood is used for kindling by attrition ʼ;
Si. riṇi ʻ drill for kindling ʼ.
